duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead requirements elicitation with key stakeholders and document stories for the Scrum team
Acquire a deep understanding of products and systems including their capabilities and features
Perform analysis of large-scale epics for decomposition and work closely with Program Leadership and teams for accurate scoping and feasibility assessment
Conduct refinement sessions to decompose features into user stories, tasks, and acceptance criteria for the development team
Schedule, coordinate, and facilitate agile ceremonies and elicitation sessions with the Product Owner and stakeholders
Collaborate within the Scrum team and Program Leadership on progress, providing updates and identifying potential risks or issues that surface during development
Develop and conduct product presentations and/or demonstrations to communicate the value, benefits, capabilities, and features to various stakeholders and development team members
Partner with Development Lead to share Scrum Master responsibilities for the development team
Perform as a change agent on identified Agile process improvements for the development team
Collaborate with the QA Lead to ensure effective coordination and execution of User Acceptance Testing efforts
Collaborate across development teams to manage dependencies and ensure risks are proactively managed
Work with the development team to demonstrate work to the Product Manager and ensure it complies with the Definition of Done (DoD)
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including operations, to identify and prioritize issues reported in a production environment for timely resolution

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
Product Owner and/or Scrum Master certification is a plus
